Marcin Warcholak (born 8 August 1989) is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a left-back for IV liga Pomerania club KP Starogard Gdański.
Honours
Arka Gdynia
* I liga: 2015–16
* Polish Cup: 2016–17
* Polish Super Cup: 2017
Olimpia Grudziądz
* III liga, group II: 2022–23
